attributes.name: Medium Halibut
attributes.description: A medium-sized halibut. This can cooked whole or salvaged for the halibut viscera; an ingredient used in alchemy.
attributes.parsed_description: A medium-sized halibut. This can cooked whole or salvaged for the halibut viscera; an ingredient used in alchemy.

attributes.name: Medium Mackerel
attributes.description: A medium-sized mackerel. This can be salvaged into food with a chance of acquiring fish oil.
attributes.parsed_description: A medium-sized mackerel. This can be salvaged into food with a chance of acquiring fish oil.

attributes.name: Medium Madtom
attributes.description: A medium-sized madtom. Highly toxic and useful in the crafting of coatings.
attributes.parsed_description: A medium-sized madtom. Highly toxic and useful in the crafting of coatings.

attributes.name: Medium Measuring Vessel
attributes.description: A vessel used to measure various amounts of fluid.
attributes.parsed_description: A vessel used to measure various amounts of fluid.

attributes.name: Medium Paddlefish
attributes.description: A medium-sized paddlefish. This can be cooked whole or salvaged for paddlefish gills, an ingredient used in alchemy.
attributes.parsed_description: A medium-sized paddlefish. This can be cooked whole or salvaged for paddlefish gills, an ingredient used in alchemy.

attributes.name: Medium Perch
attributes.description: A medium-sized perch. This can be salvaged into food with a chance of acquiring fish oil.
attributes.parsed_description: A medium-sized perch. This can be salvaged into food with a chance of acquiring fish oil.

attributes.name: Medium Pike
attributes.description: A medium-sized pike. This can be salvaged into food with a chance of acquiring fish oil.
attributes.parsed_description: A medium-sized pike. This can be salvaged into food with a chance of acquiring fish oil.

attributes.name: Medium Piranha
attributes.description: A medium-sized piranha. This can be salvaged into fish guts and possibly teeth, which make a useful alchemy ingredient.
attributes.parsed_description: A medium-sized piranha. This can be salvaged into fish guts and possibly teeth, which make a useful alchemy ingredient.

attributes.name: Medium Salmon
attributes.description: A medium-sized salmon. This can be salvaged into food with a chance of acquiring fish oil.
attributes.parsed_description: A medium-sized salmon. This can be salvaged into food with a chance of acquiring fish oil.

attributes.name: Medium Sculpin
attributes.description: A medium-sized sculpin. This can be cooked whole or salvaged for its sculpin scales; an ingredient used in alchemy.
attributes.parsed_description: A medium-sized sculpin. This can be cooked whole or salvaged for its sculpin scales; an ingredient used in alchemy.

attributes.name: Medium Snapper
attributes.description: A medium-sized snapper. This can be salvaged into food with a chance of acquiring fish oil.
attributes.parsed_description: A medium-sized snapper. This can be salvaged into food with a chance of acquiring fish oil.

attributes.name: Medium Speartooth Shark
attributes.description: A medium-sized speartooth shark. This can be salvaged for its meat, considered a delicacy and its fish guts - a rare crafting ingredient.
attributes.parsed_description: A medium-sized speartooth shark. This can be salvaged for its meat, considered a delicacy and its fish guts - a rare crafting ingredient.

attributes.name: Medium Squid
attributes.description: A medium-sized squid. This can cooked whole or salvaged into squid meat with a chance of acquiring squid ink.
attributes.parsed_description: A medium-sized squid. This can cooked whole or salvaged into squid meat with a chance of acquiring squid ink.

attributes.name: Medium Stingray
attributes.description: A medium-sized stingray. This can be salvaged for its guts with a chance of extracting both luxury meat and the poison sac, a powerful ingredient used in alchemy.
attributes.parsed_description: A medium-sized stingray. This can be salvaged for its guts with a chance of extracting both luxury meat and the poison sac, a powerful ingredient used in alchemy.

attributes.name: Medium Sturgeon
attributes.description: A medium sturgeon. This can be cooked whole or salvaged into filets. If salvaged, fish oil will definitely be obtained and there is also a chance of obtaining fish roe.
attributes.parsed_description: A medium sturgeon. This can be cooked whole or salvaged into filets. If salvaged, fish oil will definitely be obtained and there is also a chance of obtaining fish roe.

attributes.name: Medium Sunfish
attributes.description: A medium-sized sunfish. This can be salvaged into food with a chance of acquiring fish oil.
attributes.parsed_description: A medium-sized sunfish. This can be salvaged into food with a chance of acquiring fish oil.

attributes.name: Medium Swordfish
attributes.description: A medium-sized swordfish. This can be cooked whole or salvaged for high quality filets. Salvaging this will also produce lots of fish oil as a by-product.
attributes.parsed_description: A medium-sized swordfish. This can be cooked whole or salvaged for high quality filets. Salvaging this will also produce lots of fish oil as a by-product.

attributes.name: Medium Trout
attributes.description: A medium-sized trout. This can be salvaged into food with a chance of acquiring fish oil.
attributes.parsed_description: A medium-sized trout. This can be salvaged into food with a chance of acquiring fish oil.

attributes.name: Megara's Journal
attributes.description: The journal of Megara Pantasazi from the happiest times in her life
attributes.parsed_description: The journal of Megara Pantasazi from the happiest times in her life

attributes.name: Megara's Mementos
attributes.description: A keepsake from Megara's once-happy life which is almost certain to make her sad
attributes.parsed_description: A keepsake from Megara's once-happy life which is almost certain to make her sad

attributes.name: Mender's Cloth
attributes.description: Bloody cloth with imprinted memories of past menders.
attributes.parsed_description: Bloody cloth with imprinted memories of past menders.

attributes.name: Merchant Goods [Mission Item]
attributes.description: Merchant Goods [Mission Item]
attributes.parsed_description: Merchant Goods [Mission Item]

attributes.name: Mercurial Token
attributes.description: A mysterious token that seems to turn to liquid and back. Improve your Harvesting trophy with this.
attributes.parsed_description: A mysterious token that seems to turn to liquid and back. Improve your Harvesting trophy with this.

attributes.name: Mercy's Breath
attributes.description: A mysterious flower known for its curative properties.
attributes.parsed_description: A mysterious flower known for its curative properties.

attributes.name: Merrill's Soil
attributes.description: A sack full of soil collected from Merrill's Place.
attributes.parsed_description: A sack full of soil collected from Merrill's Place.

attributes.name: Metallic Boneweave
attributes.description: Thin threads of metal that seem to have been woven into bone through some magical process.
attributes.parsed_description: Thin threads of metal that seem to have been woven into bone through some magical process.
